entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the main character in the conversation. He is mentioned as being on the ramparts and struggling against an enchantment.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a person who is sneering at Dumbledore and denying his involvement in some actions.

entities.name: snape

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is bound by an enchantment and struggling against it.

entities.name: cabinet
entities.description: The cabinet is mentioned as something that Dumbledore was trying to mend.

entities.name: necklace
entities.description: A cursed necklace is sent by someone (not specified) and is bound to reach the wrong hands.

entities.name: poisoned mead
entities.description: There was a chance that Harry might drink poisoned mead.
